error_empty_service_password: Please select a service and enter the password.
error_password_too_short: The password is too short for your Scrambler definition. The minimum length is: {{value}}.
error_scrambler_general: Sorry, but something went wrong. Please reset your Scrambler definition
scramble_info: Enter a password, choose a service and hit Scramble. The Scrambler takes your master password and the service and generates a password for you. If you want to add a service or update the Scrambler, go to the settings menu.
select_service_info: The Service name is used by the Scrambler.
add_service_info: The Service name is used by the Scrambler.
edit_scrambler_info1:
The Scrambler is a mapping of characters of the service name to characters of the master password.

You can define which parts of the head or tail of the master password are replaced by parts of the head or tail of the service name.
edit_scrambler_info2: p>The minim length describes the minimum length of the service name and master password, required by your Scrambler.
